questions.answer: Sure, Our prices depend on the type of scaffolding you require, you can contact us via email info@tailoredscaffolding.co.uk or phone on 08878026349 for a more detailed quote

questions.question: I'm doing great

questions.question: Can you tell jokes?
questions.answer: Sure, Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!

questions.question: Tell me another one
questions.answer: OK, Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!

questions.question: Any more jokes
questions.answer: Absolutely, Why did the bicycle fall over? Because it was two-tired!

questions.question: Are you an accredited installer?
questions.answer: Yes we are, our scaffolders each hold their own accreditations such as the CISRS, CSCS and CHAS registered.

questions.question: I need scaffolding for a roofing project can you help?
questions.answer: Sure, I can assist you with that. Can you provide me with some more information regarding the height and size of the building? For example, is it a house, flat or a bungalow? How many levels does the building have, and for how long do you require the scaffold?

questions.question: scaffold duration

questions.answer: Hi

questions.question: I have a bungalow, I'm having a loft extension fitted!
questions.answer: Thank you for reaching out to us regarding your loft extension project on your bungalow. We’re excited to help you with your scaffolding needs! For a loft extension, we typically provide a scaffold setup that ensures safety and efficiency for both your builders and the overall project. Here’s what we propose:

questions.question: What are your proposals and what the initial steps involved in scaffold hire
questions.answer: The Initial Site Visit, will invole us conducting an on-site survey to assess the specific requirements of your property and the extension project.

questions.question: Custom Scaffold Design
questions.answer: Based on the survey, we’ll design a scaffold structure tailored to your bungalow’s dimensions and the loft extension plans.

questions.question: Scaffold Installation
questions.answer: Our experienced team will install the scaffold, ensuring it meets all safety standards and regulations.

questions.question: Ongoing Support
questions.answer: Throughout the duration of your project, we offer maintenance and adjustments to the scaffold as needed.

requestDetails.message: To proceed, could you please provide us with a few details?
details: The exact location of your bungalow.
The anticipated start date of the loft extension.
Any specific requirements or constraints we should be aware of.

nextSteps.message: Once we have this information, we can provide you with a detailed quote and timeline. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions or need further assistance.

closingMessage: We look forward to assisting you with your project!
